price: (Allāhu) yóò sọ fún èrò inú Iná pé: “Ṣé àwọn (èrò orí ògiri) wọ̀nyí ni ẹ̀yin ń búra pé Allāhu kò níí ṣíjú àánú wò? (Nítorí náà, ẹ̀yin èrò orí ògiri) ẹ wọ inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Kò níí sí ìbẹ̀rù kan fún yín. Ẹ̀yin kò sì níí banújẹ́.”
arabic: أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمۡتُمۡ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِرَحۡمَةٍۚ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ahāulāi alladhīna aqsamtum lā yanāluhumu al-lahu biraḥmatin ud'khulū al-janata lā khawfun ʿalaykum walā antum taḥzanūna
